# awx_job_template (Resource)

Example resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "awx_job_template" "default" {
  job_type = ""
  name     = ""
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `job_type` (String) Acceptable values are a choice of: run, or check.
- `name` (String)
